text:
Hey everyone,

Just following up on my previous post regarding the issue with tracking Google and Facebook leads after the recent API shift. We haven't received any feedback yet and would really appreciate your insights or suggestions on how to resolve this. Has anyone else faced similar issues or found a workaround?

Also, is there a *Discord* community for HubSpot? If so, please let us know.

Thanks in advance for your help!

Hello
please let me know where do i get these 4 functions in HubSpot? and can we perform these function through external extension?
• Screen pop
• click to dial
• no match, multimatch and single match
• activity creation

Getting a error when running `hs project dev`
```Unable to find extensions files, make sure the 'extensions.crm.cards' array is defined in the application configuration file```
But there’s aren’t any cards configured.
Do you mind sharing the current app.json for your project?

Ok interesting, and you dont have an extension folder in your source directory `src/app/extensions` ? Probably need more information about your account id you are uploading to over DM if that is the case
